data.title: Finder Inc.
data.description: Finder Inc. was founded in early 1984 in Oakland (US) by Norman Shephard and Stephan Doug. The same-named online service Finder is with 420 million users the most popular online service in the US. The service gained popularity as it was often mistaken for the app Tinder, since users, when installing the app, wrongly typed an F at the beginning, while they actually intended to type a T. Reasons for this circumstance is the close proximity of the two letters on the still very popular QWERTY keyboards. Users reported when they reckognized their mistake, weeks and even months have passed. Despite its popularity the service was subject to criticism over the past due to its alleged massive amount of data collection. (source: Wikipedia)

The same-named online service Finder is with 420 million users the most popular online service in the US. The service gained popularity as it was often mistaken for the app Tinder, since users, when installing the app, wrongly typed an F at the beginning, while they actually intended to type a T. data.title: Microsoft Corporation
data.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company with headquarters in Redmond, Washington. It develops, manufactures, licenses, supports and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Its best known software products are the Microsoft Windows line of operating systems, the Microsoft Office suite, and the Internet Explorer and Edge Web browsers. Its flagship hardware products are the Xbox video game consoles and the Microsoft Surface lineup of touchscreen personal computers. As of 2016, it is the worlds largest software maker by revenue, and one of the worlds most valuable companies. The word 'Microsoft' is a portmanteau of 'microcomputer' and 'software'. Microsoft is ranked No. 30 in the 2018 Fortune 500 rankings of the largest United States corporations by total revenue. (source: Wikipedia)

info.adress: Microsoft Ireland Operations Limited, Attn: Data Protection Officer, One Microsoft Place, South County Business Park, Leopardstown, Dublin 18, Ireland.
